examples: Shall we walk or go by bus?
I didn't want to get on the wrong bus.
No quería subirme al autobús equivocado.
Many students board the school bus before 7 a.m.
Muchos estudiantes abordan el autobús escolar antes de las 7 a.m.
He was seriously injured when the band's tour bus crashed.
Resultó gravemente herido cuando se estrelló el autobús de la gira de la banda.
